Title: Getting Even
Plot: Eddie is getting the squeeze and it's up to the "Hustle" gang to set things straight. Although not an official grifter, Eddie is more than a bartender, he's a member of the crew. So when his father is held ransom by the owner of his Father's nursing home - it's personal.
GuestStars: Philippe De Grossouvre, Tim Matthews, Alison Garland, Dido Miles, Paul Bigley, Craig Crosbie, Patricia Hodge, Alan David, Kenneth Cope, Rupert Vansittart
